name: Average Nite on TinyBird Dot Zone
name_original: Average Nite on TinyBird Dot Zone
description:
one nite on zone you were watching Deathrace 2000 on tinybird.zone ...

then, everything changed.

Controls -

Arrows - Move

Spacebar or M - Shoot

R - Reset

Credits-

Game by Domino User "FSO"

Music by Domino User "TTC"

Music by Food House

Clip and Audio from Deathrace 2000
